title.en: Monsters Die If They Are Killed

description.en: Su Zhou, who was born with exceptional physical attributes, encountered an evil cult during an oversea expedition with his childhood friend. In an attempt to rescue his childhood friend, he went into the enemy’s base alone. On the brink of death, he made a pact with a great entity and underwent a transcendent awakening in the new era of spiritual resurgence. In this universe that's in the twilight of destruction, one which is filled with monsters, demons, and formidable beings, evil entities are slayed in search of satisfying revenge. He won’t back down in fear, nor will he be bewildered. He doesn’t commit deliberate charity, nor does he seek justice. Su Zhou is the foe of all evils — “I’ll slaughter every evil soul that exists until no one dares to claim its name!” After all, just like that well-known cliche “People die if they are killed”, “Monsters die if they are killed."
description.es-la: Su Zhou se encontró con una organización de culto durante un viaje al extranjero, firmó un contrato con una gran existencia cuando estaba al borde de la vida o la muerte, y tuvo un despertar extraordinario, entrando en una nueva era. Véngate en este mundo de monstruos, demonios y grandes seres. No retrocederá con miedo ni desconcertado. Su Zhou es solo el enemigo del mal: «¡Mata todo el mal en este mundo hasta que nadie se atreva a llamarlo mal!» Al igual que la conocida tontería «Si matan a una persona, morirá» «Cuando un monstruo es asesinado, morirá».
